nodes.bodyText:
Is it possible that the classpath contains something like:
"path1.to.jar1.jar";"path2.to.jar2.jar";...;"pathn.to.jarn.jar"?
If that is the case, removing first and last quote might work, but asStream() might fail?

On Windows, the value of the -cp argument for native-image.cmd needs to be wrapped in double quotes. I'll update the code, so that these quotes are only added at the very end, when actually building the process of the native-image command. That way, we won't need to deal with it when working with the classpath in other sections of the code.
